interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: BQYPOWER Gel Nail Polish Kit with UV Light 84W LED Nail Lamp 8 Nude Colors Gel Nail Polish Starter Kit with No Wipe Base Top Coat, Manicure Kit, Nail Primer, Nail Art Decorations Home DIY Gift Review Date: 2021/07/07 Store: BQYPOWER Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BQYPOWER', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Gel Nail, Nail Lamp', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 9.84 x 5.08 inches; 3.33 Pounds'} Review Text: This is my first ever gel polish kit and I’m really happy with it. It comes with everything you need. The instructions are way to follow and I did t have any trouble. Ive read a couple other reviews that say it doesn’t dry and I did have that issue at first, but I figured out that you need to use really thin layers and to leave you hands under the light for about 15-20 longer than the instructions say. That’s colors are really pretty and I can’t wait to play around with the gems that come with it.

My complaints are that the colors aren’t labeled so you have to open them to see the colors. Also the colors smell horrible! They are very strong and sting my nose. The top and bottom coats are labeled and don’t have a sting smell. The polish last a little over a week and that’s only because I started picking at it. If I haven’t done that it would have lasted longer. Review Title: Everything you need for a great price Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay Huxley {'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} This mask is one my favorite clay masks that I've tried. It so gentle on the skin and hardly any scent to it. It's not too thick and easily applied in a thin layer. It exfoliates well and leaves my face feeling clean and visibly brighter after the first use. I was also pleasantly surprised that my face didn't feel dry after and it actually felt moisturized. A little goes a long way and it's well worth the price. The packaging is beautiful and looks like a luxury item. This would make a great gift! Will absolutely be buying this again when this tube is finished. Visibly brightens my skin DEROL Eyeshadow Stick Sets 12 Colors，Long Lasting Glitter Eye Brightener Eyeliner Sticks,Cream to Powder Waterproof Eye Makeup,Eyeshadow Capsules Crayon,Shimmer Eye Shadow Pencils (12 Colors/Box) DEROL {'Brand': 'DEROL', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream,Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '715962598334'} I was really excited to receive these little eyeshadows. They are small and compact, which makes them easy to pack and travel with. The colors are pretty and while not super pigmented at to begin with they are buildable and blend well. I tried them with eye primer and with out and they lasted the same for me. I will say I have oily eyelids and noticed that they don't last more than a couple hours.
I think these would make a great gift for adults, teens, or even younger kids who want play makeup. My daughters who are 6 and 7 found them one day and loved using them. They especially loved the blue and purple that they said made them look like a mermaid. They are super fun and priced fairly so I would say give them a try! Compact and easy application 2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'} This mascara did not work for me. I tried it with a primer and without to see how it performed and both times it flaked with in 4 hours giving me raccoon eyes. I wanted to love it though because it is very pigmented and applied smoothly without clumps. Didn't work for me, but that doesn't mean it wont for others. Pigmented but flaked Movo Matte Liquid Foundation and Makeup Sponge Set – 5 Shades Medium Coverage Lightweight Feel Liquid Foundation for Combination / Oily Skin, Flawless Natural Look with Matte Finish 1.0 oz (#3 Medium beige) Movo {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Movo', 'Product Dimensions': '5.11 x 1.57 x 1 inches; 2.89 Ounces'} It gives a good light to medium coverage, but I found that I could only use a little bit because it would make my skin look cakey and dry. It applies easily with the damp beauty blender and feels lightweight. I was able to apply blush and bronzer easily. It lasted all day and didn't settle in my fine lines and gives a smooth matte finish. One thing I really like is that it didn't irritate my skin and cause a reaction like a lot of foundations do. A little goes a long way LUVCIRCUS 001 Professional Hair Brush-This luxury boar and nylon bristle hair brush is a meticulously crafted, premium, flat hair brush. An exceptional hairbrush for women who love gorgeous hair. LUVCIRCUS {'Brand': 'LUVCIRCUS', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Straight,Thick', 'Material': 'Boar, Nylon', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 4.75 x 1.5 inches; 7.55 Ounces'} This is a pretty brush that feels good on the scalp and brushes and distributes my natural oils nicely , but it is way over priced. Almost $50 for a brush that is average is crazy. I don't feel that is there is anything special about this brush that you can't find for $15 at Walmart. Too expensive BQYPOWER Gel Nail Polish Kit with UV Light 84W LED Nail Lamp 8 Nude Colors Gel Nail Polish Starter Kit with No Wipe Base Top Coat, Manicure Kit, Nail Primer, Nail Art Decorations Home DIY Gift BQYPOWER {'Brand': 'BQYPOWER', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Gel Nail, Nail Lamp', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 9.84 x 5.08 inches; 3.33 Pounds'} This is my first ever gel polish kit and I’m really happy with it. It comes with everything you need. The instructions are way to follow and I did t have any trouble. Ive read a couple other reviews that say it doesn’t dry and I did have that issue at first, but I figured out that you need to use really thin layers and to leave you hands under the light for about 15-20 longer than the instructions say. That’s colors are really pretty and I can’t wait to play around with the gems that come with it.

My complaints are that the colors aren’t labeled so you have to open them to see the colors. Also the colors smell horrible! They are very strong and sting my nose. The top and bottom coats are labeled and don’t have a sting smell. The polish last a little over a week and that’s only because I started picking at it. If I haven’t done that it would have lasted longer. Everything you need for a great price
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor skincare, particularly clay masks for gentle exfoliation and brightening effects, and is exploring vibrant eye makeup options. They are incorporating lightweight, natural-finish foundations into their routine while remaining attentive to their sensitive skin.

- **Skin Type:** With sensitive skin, the user prioritizes hypoallergenic, non-irritating formulations for skincare and makeup, exercising caution with foundations to avoid irritation.

- **Key Features Valued:** Effective cleansing, moisturizing properties, and simple application are crucial. The user appreciates versatile, buildable makeup with aesthetically pleasing packaging for gifting, seeking performance to prevent cakiness or dryness.

- **Consumer Behavior:** Recently, the user has expanded their product exploration to include nail care, indicating an interest in DIY beauty solutions. They value compact, travel-friendly products that blend fun with functionality and demonstrate a willingness to repurchase high-quality items while remaining price-sensitive.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Satisfaction remains high with products aligning with their needs. However, there is a growing scrutiny concerning performance to avoid irritation, emphasizing effective skincare and playful makeup solutions.

**Trends:** The user maintains a commitment to effective skincare alongside a cautious yet evolving approach to both makeup and nail care, emphasizing practicality, enjoyment, and sensitivity towards skin-friendly formulations.
